meanings.sent1: The car with the brakiest brakes stopped the fastest.
meanings.sent2: My bike has good brakes, but yours are the brakiest.
meanings.sent3: I tried to fix the brakes, but now they're the brakiest in the neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the brakiest force in overcoming obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The sound of screeching brakes was the brakiest noise in the silent night.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the cars, hers has the brakiest brakes.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the brakes, making them the brakiest in town.
meanings.sent3: His love for cars is so strong, he dreams of owning the brakiest car ever.
meanings.sent4: The mountain road demanded the brakiest skills to navigate safely.
meanings.sent5: The brakiest brake pads ensured a smooth and safe ride down the hill.
